attributes.action: Call a General Election in May 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Labour government has now shown its true colours under Gordon Brown with a catalogue of blunders being made. Pubic confidence in the prime minister(for who none of us have voted to be PM),and his government is at an all time low. It is time that those who pay the salary of those in government had a say in what is going n.  This can only be done by a General election.  Mr Brown we ask that you do the honourable thing and declaire a general election and stop becoming a dctatorship.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPrenumeration/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
